items.sentence: Tom was pulled over by a policeman who gave him a speeding ticket.
Tom was surprised to see Mary out jogging so early in the morning.
Tom was talking with those strangers over there just a minute ago.
Tom was the only one who knew how to start a fire without matches.
I haven\'t been back to Boston since I graduated from high school.
I think Tom doesn\'t speak French very well, but I could be wrong.
Tom could use a little extra time to review for the upcoming test.
Tom decided that it would be fun to go camping with John and Mary.
Do you really think Tom is the only one here who can speak French?
Have you ever heard of the story of the little boy who cried wolf?
